fulltext:
NGUYEN MINH QUAN 
PERSONAL DETAILS 
Full Name: Nguyen Minh Quan 
DOB: 26-09-1992 
Gender: Male 
Address: 128/48/14A Dinh Tien Hoang St, 1 Ward, Binh Thanh District, 
HCMC, Vietnam. 
Phone Number: (84) 0981 369 269 
Email: quanmn.libra@gmail.com 
Github: https://github.com/dereknguyen269 
Linkedin: quanmnlibra 
EDUCATION 
University of Information Technology (2010 -2015) 
Computer Engineer 
PERSONAL STATEMENT 
I'm a Full Stack Developer. I have more than 4 years of experience in the Web Development and
4 years working in Ruby on Rails. Experienced with all stages of the development cycle for
dynamic web projects. Well-versed in numerous programming languages including Ruby and
JavaScript. A spirit of learning new technologies. The sense of responsibility, carefulness in all
the works done are my greatest strengths. 
CAREER GOAL 
Short Term: 
●
To develop a career in a company that specializes in programming. Having a stable job, 
long term. Dynamic working environment, professional dedication and contribution to 
the development of the company. 
●
Trying to become a good programmer who meets creative passion, exploring technology, 
creating products that professional. 
●
Do not stop learning experiences, improve knowledge and programming skills, build 
ourselves up to be promoted at work. 
Long Term: 
●
Become a Senior full stack developer; passionate pursuit to become Technical Leader. 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
Having good knowledge in: 
- 4 years of experience with strong background in Back-end Web Development. 
- 3 years of experience with Ruby and Rails (4.x, 5.x). 
- Experience working with Javascript,HTML,CSS. 
- Database: Mysql, Postgres. 
- Testing Frameworks: Rspec, Minitest. 
DEVELOPMENT TOOLS: 
- Git, Docker. 
- Knowledge deploying applications on cloud such as Amazon EC2, Heroku, DigitalOcean. 
WORK HISTORY 
Full stack Ruby on Rails Developer at Revollet (Apr / 2017 - Present) 
My responsibilities are working with team leader a team including 5 developers,  development 
and maintenance REVOLLET. Revollet is the main project, it is the cryptocurrency trading 
platform with platform on web application. At current, REVOLLET is available in Japan and 
Malaysia markets.The web application is developing by Ruby on Rails framework. 
Besides in other projects:
●
Estimation. 
●
Discussion with team and customers. 
●
Maintaining performance of existing client websites. 
●
Suggesting improvements on design and functionality. 
●
Troubleshooting and problems solving. 
Projects 
❏ Revollet / AsianPay: E-Wallet platform works like an online banking service provided 
by ordinary banks. We offer currency exchange, money remittance, prepaid card 
issuance/loading and forex trading platform. Our system is developed by inhouse 
development team and offer flexible and secure service.  More descriptions of apps can 
see at https://revollet.io and https://asianpay.net . 
❏ Jojos: The discussion platform for care workers and customers. It support on two 
platforms web and mobile. Jojos is  developing by Ruby on Rails framework for API and 
VueJs for client side. More descriptions of apps can see at https://jojos.chat . 
Ruby on Rails Developer at Golden Owl Consulting (Dec / 2015 - Apr / 2017) 
My responsibilities are working with team leader a team including more 10 developers. 
Discussion together with Senior developers and member of team. Mentor for new member. 
Besides in other projects:
●
Maintaining performance of existing client websites. 
●
Suggesting improvements on design and functionality. 
●
Diagnosing and rectifying performance issues. Troubleshooting and problems solving. 
Projects 
❏ IADOA :  is an E-Commerce site that sells different style of Aodai - traditional dress of 
Vietnam. Technology using: Ruby on Rails with Spree, MySQL.  More descriptions of 
apps can see at https://iadoa.com . 
❏ CPD : is a search engine to look for variable online courses which mainly held in 
Australia. Technology using: Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL. More descriptions of apps can 
see at http://nexlec.com . 
❏ A21 : The online networking platform that connects Alliance 21's global partners. 
Technology using: Ruby on Rails, ReactJs and PostgreSQL. More descriptions of apps 
can see at http://www.alex.world . 
❖ I working remotely with Singapore develop team (https://www.tinkerbox.com.sg). 
❖ Discussion with our developer,  project manager and our customer via Slack, 
Basecamp. 
❖ Daily report with customer and project manager. 
PHP Developer at BuzzMetrics (March / 2014 -  July / 2015) 
Development ERB websites for Buzzmetrics with their developer team. 
My responsibilities are working with team leader a team including more 5 developers.  Learning 
about UI/UX. Researching about bootstrap, jquery, highchart,... Discussion with my team. 
Developing web code. Auditing websites and reporting any performance issues to Senior 
developers. Suggesting improvements on design and functionality. Troubleshooting and 
problems solving. More descriptions of apps can see at http://buzzmetrics.com . 
ADDITION INFORMATION 
Strong points: 
-
Ability to learn quickly 
-
Reading and Communicating English well 
-
Ability to work well in team and independence 
-
Working hard and serious 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
